channel.title: HOW do you change a NPC'S name! AND EQUIPTMENT STATUS HELP!
channel.description:
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ H E L P ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
AND THE EQUIPTMENT DOESNT SHOW UP ON MY EQUIPTMENT STATUS SCREEN!!!

item.title: HOW do you change a NPC'S name! AND EQUIPTMENT STATUS HELP!
item.dc:creator: @thel33test thel33test
item.description:
@thel33test wrote:

hmm this may be an old topic but It’s still on the forums… so I’d like to Suggest, Go into your “class8.java” to change the item name or the item look ect. Search for “armadyl godsword” and you may find it. For npc’s I’m not really sure but I do know that the Npc.cfg won’t change the name of the npc in the game because that is for the client.

Read full topic
item.source: HOW do you change a NPC'S name! AND EQUIPTMENT STATUS HELP!

item.title: HOW do you change a NPC'S name! AND EQUIPTMENT STATUS HELP!
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

For your equipment screen what do you mean you cant see your items if so then what client your using how it says show equipment w/e you have to add that server sided too.

Read full topic

item.title: HOW do you change a NPC'S name! AND EQUIPTMENT STATUS HELP!
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

to change ur npc go to npc.cfg or w\e in ur config and search the name of the npc u want to change, and rename it.

Read full topic
